title: Music @ Worlds
body:
I would like to know if someone has the list of songs used at worlds? I was only able to listen to the games being played and I also missed the beginning of the rebroadcast. I am particularly interested in knowing what the song was about 8 minutes before the broadcast had begun for the pregame leading into game 1. Of course a full list would be fantastic as well. I guess I just need to hope that I can catch another rebroadcast or the VOD hopefully has it.

Thanks in advance if anyone happens to know what songs were used.

replies.body:
Hello! 

A Redditor was kind enough to put together a [playlist](https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/3nl7ak/revealing_the_worlds_2015_playlist/) of the music that's been played at Worlds. Hope this helps!

Yes it was. Thank you for that information. I found the song I was looking for. About the only negative was that I had to basically blindly go through the music until I found what I was looking for. Though I found a few more songs that I really liked as well so it certainly was not all bad.

Thanks for the info.
Sorry it was kind of a mess. D: Glad you found what you were looking for!

Still, it was better than flying blind and potentially never finding the song and being haunted for eternity without being able to listen to the music again. It would have been nice to know when each piece was used, but all in all I think it worked out for the better as listened to alot of other music scores that were equally impressive to me.

All in all I did not go home disappointed. I found what I was looking for and then some.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=B263rr6B,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-10-16T21:11:34.608+0000)
>
> Hello! 
> 
> A Redditor was kind enough to put together a [playlist](https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/3nl7ak/revealing_the_worlds_2015_playlist/) of the music that's been played at Worlds. Hope this helps!

Not to sound rude or anything, but is there a reason why you guys at Riot don't make a list yourselves? 

Kinda seems like something you should do if you're going to be using peoples' music and stuff.
I believe we do, but after the event. IIRC, it's what we did last year.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=B263rr6B,comment-id=000000010000,timestamp=2015-10-19T18:56:38.608+0000)
>
> I believe we do, but after the event. IIRC, it's what we did last year.

Oh, okay. Thank you for the response.
